videos.headline: Purdue pads lead with 32-yard TD
videos.description: Purdue RB Brian Lankford-Johnson helps extend the lead over Illinois with a 32-yard touchdown, putting Purdue up 14-6.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Purdue pads lead with 32-yard TD) 2016/10/08 ESHEET
